content.value: public virtual ValueTask Find(Func<ITestCase, ValueTask<bool>> callback, ITestFrameworkDiscoveryOptions discoveryOptions, Type[]? types = null, CancellationToken? cancellationToken = null)

Public Overridable Function Find(callback As Func(Of ITestCase, ValueTask(Of Boolean)), discoveryOptions As ITestFrameworkDiscoveryOptions, types As Type() = Nothing, cancellationToken As CancellationToken? = Nothing) As ValueTask

parameters.description: Called for each discovered test. Return true to continue test discovery; return false to cancel test discovery.
The options used by the test framework during discovery.
When passed a non-null collection, only returns tests found from one of the provided types; when passed a null collection, discovers all tests in the assembly.
The optional cancellation token which can be used to cancel the test discovery process.

content.value: protected abstract ValueTask<bool> FindTestsForType(TTestClass testClass, ITestFrameworkDiscoveryOptions discoveryOptions, Func<ITestCase, ValueTask<bool>> discoveryCallback)

Protected MustOverride Function FindTestsForType(testClass As TTestClass, discoveryOptions As ITestFrameworkDiscoveryOptions, discoveryCallback As Func(Of ITestCase, ValueTask(Of Boolean))) As ValueTask(Of Boolean)

parameters.description: The options used by the test framework during discovery.

The callback that is called for each discovered test case. The return value of the callback indicates the same thing as the return value of this function: return true to continue discovery, or false to halt it.

return.description: Returns true if discovery should continue; false otherwise.
